page.title: 01Nurse At Fair Mile
page.content: {The nurse} at Fair Mile Hospital has been working there for 2.5 years, and likes her work very much. She usually spends 37.5 hours a week there and feels that she doesn't have sufficient pay. She wears a {uniform,} which is a light blue dress with a green belt, to prevent the spread of infection and to protect her own clothes. {Different uniforms denote different rank and experience.} The {ladies wear yellow, green, light blue or navy blue,} whilst the {men wear grey suits.} She travels to work by a hospital mini bus, and has her meals in the staff canteen. There are 40 wards each with 30 beds. These patients stay in hospital for a long time because they are mentally ill. The nurse has to bathe and feed the patients and take them for walks. She needs to be very patient, spending much of her time in conversation.
